document_data.mainbody:
orzil was the leader of the troglodytes in the service of House Auvryndar in Undermountain in the early 1490s DR.
He lead his fellow twenty troglodytes that were trained and equipped by the drow.
Gorzil secretly plotted to kill Vlonwelv Auvryndar and become the only ruler of Muirals Gauntlet.
